name: A Tentacle With A Knife!
description:
Mouse: Move tentacle

Esc: Pause

Left Click: Menu option, advance text

Right Click: Menu option

*******************************

Protect your power switch from the incoming lab assistants. Once they reach it, it's game over

Swing the tentacle around to knock out your foes.

*Tentacle slaps - 1 point

*Knife stabs - 2 points

Impress your friends with your high score!

*********************************

Created for the GameMaker Community's GMC Game Jam 41
